title: The Commencement Certificate beyond 75 % of the admissible BUA may be released once the Occupation Certificate for AH tenements/Amenities is granted
clause_text: The Commencement Certificate beyond 75 % of the admissible BUA may be released once the Occupation Certificate for AH tenements/Amenities is granted.
section: Compensation for development of infrastructure in lands handed over to MCGM and constructed BUA.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The Commencement Certificate beyond 75 % of the admissible BUA may be released once the Occupation Certificate for AH tenements/Amenities is granted.
